item.description:
Maddy’s Lounge
1639 Broadway
Rte 1 so/ Rte 99
Saugus, MA

1st Saturday of Every Month

On Saturday 05-01-10 we celebrate CINCO DE MAYO at Maddy's Lounge

We will be celebrating with a COMPLIMENTARY Mexican buffet, FREE Raffle tickets to win some great gifts and gift cards and we will be doing a 50/50 raffle. I'll be making my SPECIAL PINATA and as you know it's very SPECIAL especially whats in it.

Buffet will consist of : Taco bar, Spanish Rice (Meatless), Re-fried & Black beans, Pork (Penir), Spanish Chicken Stew, Chips, Tortilla shells (hard & soft) and more..........

Great DJ that will mixing her tunes in the club, while Connie will be singing away doing her KARAOKE in the Lounge.

To be followed at The Hide Away (Anthony's 105 Canal St, Malden, MA) all night long till 1:30 AM

• Free Parking
• 21+, Proper I.D. required
• Hi Def TV (Sports Channel)
• Plenty of seating
• Great FOOD
• HUGE dance floor
• Premium Liquor
• KENO
• $10.00 cover charge
• Pleasant lounge area (separate room)
Any questions email BlushBoston@yahoo.com or call 617 877 1808
item.name: Maddy's Lounge & Bar (All LADIES T-Dance)
